title: "Deluxe" square compact sans
content:
Anyone got any leads, or is it customized?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021124533/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_28.gif) | 2.77 KB |

 [‹ (x) Hallingskarvet Skisenter Sudndalen resort logo - Brush Script, Microgramma {Paul H}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021124533/http:/typophile.com/node/31480 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Jagged Globe logo - Delta Jaeger {Marc O} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021124533/http:/typophile.com/node/31441 "Go to next forum topic")
author: vormburo

comments.content:
It looks very hand made by an amateur letterer. ’E’s are different and ’X’ is odd. But lovely anyway. Reminds me of [this sign](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021124533/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/stewf/306099757/in/set-72157594386592999/) I saw in Berlin.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021124533im_/http:/typophile.com/files/306099757_305bfd1109_5443.jpg)
  
Consider [Refrigerator](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021124533/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=3&displayfontid=MSF.118752.0.0&fontRendererText=DELUXE), [Manifesto](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021124533/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=4&displayfontid=TY.116876.0.0&fontRendererText=DELUXE), [Tasse](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021124533/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&startrow=1&records=20&currpage=1&totalrecords=5&searchby=&searchID=&searchletter=&searchstr=tasse&font_categories_checkbox=font_name_search&fontRendererText=DELUXE) and [Topic](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021124533/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Topic). Also, Nick Sherman’s [Plan 9](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021124533/http:/www.nicksherman.com/design/plan9.html).
Thanks for posting this Stephen - it’s a lovely picture and i am such a sucker for squarish, narrow sans serifs.

Ditto. I never got an ID on the one I posted months ago - the designer didn’t return my email.

[http://typophile.com/node/21422](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021124533/http:/typophile.com/node/21422 "http://typophile.com/node/21422")
Thanks Stephen. I figured it would be handdrawn. I know that store owner a little bit, so next time I may ask him.

Also have a look at “Freundschaft” by Stephan Müller:  
www.lineto.com/The+Designers/Stephan+Müller/Fonts/Freundschaft/
